pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.3_0: “saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.4_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.5_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— ‘bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.7_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.8_0: saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.11_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.12_0: saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.13_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.14_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.17_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.18_0: saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.22_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.24_0: ‘saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.25_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.26_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.29_0: saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.30_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.31_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.32_0: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.32_1: sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.33_0: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṁ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.34_0: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.6_0: “saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.7_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.19_0: “bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.24_0: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.26_0: ‘saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.36_0: ‘saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.47_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.50_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.52_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.53_0: bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.57_1: saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.60_0: Ayaṁ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṁ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.63_0: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṁsaddā evaṁsilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.65_0: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.66_0: bhaginiyo kho saṁsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.70_0: Saṅgho itthannāmaṁ bhikkhuniṁ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.71_0: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.75_0: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.76_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.80_0: Saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṁ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.89_0: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ, tenapi vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.2_0: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.14_0: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.16_0: Yesaṁ bhikkhunī aññataraṁ vā aññataraṁ vā āpajjati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.17_0: Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho tattha sā bhikkhunī abbhetabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.18_0: Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho taṁ bhikkhuniṁ abbheyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.19_0: Sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṁ tattha sāmīci.
